html: Just as the names Sodom and Gomorrah came to signify injustice, perversion, and damnation (Genesis 18:20; 19:24 ; Isaiah 1:9-10 ), so the names of the enemies of Jehovah’s servants are stained forever. Even as the names of persons in the Babylon category are cut off from the earth (Isaiah 14:22; 48:18-19 ), so the names of those in the Perdition category are cut off from the earth and from eternity (Isaiah 26:13-14; 38:18 ). Consistent with ascent to higher states of blessedness, on the other hand, Jehovah’s servants receive a new name and a higher spiritual commission (Isaiah 40:26; 56:4-7; 66:22 ).
